title: Donnie Darko (2001)

title: Source Code (2011)
explanation: This plot aligns very well with the user's preferences, as it is a sci-fi thriller that explores themes of cloning and freedom. The protagonist, Captain Colter Stevens, is essentially cloned into another person's body and experiences their last eight minutes of life, giving him the freedom to alter events in that timeline. The plot also touches on themes of consciousness and the value of life, as Stevens is initially unaware that he is in a coma and being kept alive only to serve as a test subject for the Source Code project. Overall, the plot is a great fit for the user's preferences.
